## \*\*Academic Programming\*\*

Read in [Zotero](%5Bhttps://github.com/zotero/zotero)](<https://github.com/zotero/zotero>)) and cite using [citr](%5Bhttps://github.com/crsh/citr)](<https://github.com/crsh/citr>)) for RStudio; optional: VSCode using [Citation Picker](%5Bhttps://github.com/mblode/vscode-zotero)](<https://github.com/mblode/vscode-zotero>)) and [Better BibTeX](%5Bhttps://github.com/retorquere/zotero-better-bibtex)](<https://github.com/retorquere/zotero-better-bibtex>))
